synopsis.text:
Force ful factions aiming for global domination are on the loose! The Telegraph Pole Society and the Phone Pole Team are scheming to conquer the world, one prefecture at a time. To counter these sinister plans, the local high school principal and the mayor's office rally an unlikely defense force comprising high school students and baseball team members.

Enter Shogi Morita, Kuho Tasuke, Akiko Ifukube, and a cyborg named Kami Sanchinâ€”once a local boy, now transformed by the eccentric high school scientist, Dr. Inogami. As our heroes navigate through faceless minions, undercover missions, and unexpected romantic encounters, they must rise to the challenge and protect their neighborhood.

Can this motley crew of high schoolers and a cyborg thwart the evil plans of the Telegraph Pole Society and the Phone Pole Team? Join them in this thrilling one-shot OVA as they fight to save their world and prove themselves worthy of the city council's trust.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
